topic.title: Fan location rules for HP BladeSystem c7000 Enclosure
topic.keywords: fan rules HP BladeSystem c7000 Enclosure

content.p: The HP BladeSystem c7000 Enclosure ships with four HP Active Cool Fans and supports up to 10 fans. Install fans in even numbered groups, based on the total number of server blades installed in the enclosure. Install fan blanks in any unused fan bays.
Fan bays 4, 5, 9, and 10 are used to support a maximum of two devices located in device bays 1, 2, 9, or 10.
Fan bays 3, 4, 5, 8, 9, and 10 are used to support a maximum of eight devices in device bays 1, 2, 3, 4, 9, 10, 11, or 12.
Fan bays 1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 7, 9, and 10 are used to support a maximum of 16 devices in any device bay.
All fan bays are used to support a maximum of 16 devices in any device bay.
